news.title: Will AI mean better adverts or 'creepy slop'?
news.summary: Advertisers are using AI to personalise adverts but not everyone agrees that's a good idea.

news.title: 'Maybe I got in Ronaldo's head' - managers react to Portugal star's red
news.summary: Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo was sent off in his side's defeat against the Republic of Ireland but was it deserved?
